{{wikipedia|Liangguang}}

===Etymology===
Literally "two Guangs". From most [[viceroyalty|viceroyalties]] consisting of a pair of provinces. Also a contraction of Guangdong ({{zh-l|廣東}}) and Guangxi ({{zh-l|廣西}}).
